name: A. Save Luke
statement:
Luke Skywalker got locked up in a rubbish shredder between two presses.
R2D2 is already working on his rescue, but Luke needs to stay alive as
long as possible. For simplicity we will assume that everything happens
on a straight line, the presses are initially at coordinates and , and
they move towards each other with speed and , respectively. Luke has
width and is able to choose any position between the presses. Luke dies
as soon as the distance between the presses is less than his width. Your
task is to determine for how long Luke can stay alive.
